Class AuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.service.AuthenticationService
public class AuthenticationService extends Object
Service class that handles user authentication operations. This includes login, password management, and validation functions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
PaNotify Team

  • Method Details

    • login

      public User login(String username, String password, String accountType) throws SQLException
      Authenticates a user based on username, password, and account type.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to authenticate
      password - The password to verify
      accountType - The type of account ("Student" or "Instructor")
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object if successful, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(int userId, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws SQLException
      Changes a user's password after verifying the old password.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      oldPassword - The current password for verification
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if password was changed successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String email, String newPassword) throws SQLException
      Resets a user's password using their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if password was reset successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a password against security requirements. Currently simplified for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets requirements, false otherwise

    • validateEmail

      public boolean validateEmail(String email)
      Validates an email address format.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to validate
      Returns:
      true if the email format is valid, false otherwise
